ca.ualberta.CMPUT301W15T06

Class AppSingleton

  • java.lang.Object
    • ca.ualberta.CMPUT301W15T06.AppSingleton

  • public class AppSingleton
extends java.lang.Object
    This class is a static class to store some information that we want to share between the whole application. The role is to ensure a class has only one instance and provide a global point of access to it.
    Version:
    04/07/2015
    Author:
    CMPUT301W15T06
    See Also:
    DateFormat, SimpleDateFormat, Date, Locale, EditText

      • getInstance

        public static AppSingleton getInstance()
        This static method will check if there's an existing AppSingleton object, if not, create a new one and return it for further use.
        Returns:
        an AppSingleton that shares all the data within different classes

      • formatDate

        public static java.lang.String formatDate(java.util.Date date)
        This method will provide a standard format for Date object and return it as a String variable. It also checks whether the Date object date is null, if it is, return empty value.
        Parameters:
        date - a date with certain format (like "15-Mar-2015")
        Returns:
        format.format(date) a String variable
        See Also:
        DateFormat, SimpleDateFormat, Date
